entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 40 percent chance of showers late in the morning and early afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 24. Humidex 32. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning in the evening and ending overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016
